survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their experience with smartphone applications, focusing on usability, features, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use smartphone apps on a daily basis?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use smartphone apps on a daily basis?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which types of apps do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of apps do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using smartphone apps?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using smartphone apps?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance (speed, responsiveness) of the apps you use?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the options are evenly balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance (speed, responsiveness) of the apps you use?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your favorite apps to others?

questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe options to gauge recommendation likelihood.
